CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Sponsor__r.MobilePhone ), NULL, "("& MID(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE( Sponsor__r.MobilePhone , ".", ''),"-",""),"+",""),1,3)& ") "& MID(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE( Sponsor__r.MobilePhone , ".", ''),"-",""),"+",""),4,3)& "-"& MID(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE( Sponsor__r.MobilePhone , ".", ''),"-",""),"+",""),7,4) )
CustomField.label: Sponsor Mobile
